mapper.select:
select count(1) from contract c left join merchant_sign ms on c.merchant_id=ms.merchant_id where 1=1
and c.ope_user in
#{item}
and ms.subject like concat('%',#{company},'%')
and ms.mobile like concat('%',#{mobile},'%')
and c.merchant_id in (select id from merchant where shop like concat('%',#{shop},'%'))

select c.id, c.merchant_id as merchantId, c.ope_user as opeUser, c.buy_type as buyType , c.ct, c.ut, c.sign_status as signStatus, c.sign_type as signType, c.flow_id as flowId , c.document_id as documentId, c.document_name as documentName, ms.subject, ms.person, ms.mobile, ms.tax from contract c left join merchant_sign ms on c.merchant_id=ms.merchant_id where 1=1
and c.ope_user in
#{item}
and ms.subject like concat('%',#{company},'%')
and ms.mobile like concat('%',#{mobile},'%')
and c.merchant_id in (select id from merchant where shop like concat('%',#{shop},'%'))
limit #{page}, 10
SELECT count(1) FROM contract where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(ct) and merchant_id=#{mid}
